context.rdfs:comment:
The act of obtaining an object under an agreement to return it at a later date. Reciprocal of LendAction.

Related actions:

  • LendAction: Reciprocal of BorrowAction.
context.rdfs:label: BorrowAction

properties.rdfs:comment: A sub property of participant. The person that lends the object being borrowed.
properties.rdfs:label: lender
